translations: v．当司机，为…开车：作为职业司机为他人驾驶汽车。
· He is chauffeuring the guests to the party.
他正在为客人开车去派对。

sentences.sentence: Pete immediately agreed to share the chauffeuring.
sentences.translation: 皮特立即答应开车送她们。

sentences.sentence: I spent most of the day chauffeuring the kids around.
sentences.translation: 我给孩子们当了大半天的司机。

sentences.sentence: And anyway, she added, all this chauffeuring to and from the office has to be reported as income at tax time.
sentences.translation: 她又说，无论如何由司机接送上下班到报税时都要算作收入填报。
